text:
Isacio Calleja García (6 December 1936 – 4 February 2019) was a Spanish footballer. He was born in Valle de Cerrato, Spain. He played as a defender. Calleja played for Atlético Madrid from 1958 to 1972 and for the national team from 1961 to 1972.
Calleja died in Madrid on 4 February 2019 at the age of 82.
